ProductInfo.Features:
Dual SIM Card support; Social Networking Capabilities; 1.3MP Camera, 1.8-inch LCD TFT display; 1280 x 1024 pixels and Video Recording; FM radio; Bluetooth v2.0 with A2DP; Music and Video player.
Unlocked Dual SIM Quad-Band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 MHz (Both SIMs) and GPRS data capabilities.
This unlocked cell phone will work on GSM carries like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported.
TFT Display, 56K Colors; Organizer; Internal Memory of 64 MB ROM, 32 MB RAM; Games; Java capabilities; WAP 2.0/xHTML Browser and microSD expendability up to 8GB.
Talk time up to 1 hr 30 min - Standby up to 150 hrs.
ProductInfo.Name: BLU M110 Swing Unlocked Phone with Dual SIM Card support, 1.3MP Camera, Bluetooth v2.0 with A2DP, Music and Video player - US Warranty - Violet
